content.description:
German poster of Kaiser Wilhelm I and Chancellor Otto von Bismarck, 1888

Private Collection/Bridgeman Images

Caption reads: “We Germans fear God and nobody else in this world.”
content.question: The message of the poster is best explained in the context of the

choices.label: expansion of European empires in Africa
successful unification of Germany under Prussian leadership
growth of German industrial production during the second industrial revolution
turn toward materialism in European culture after 1848

content.answer: successful unification of Germany under Prussian leadership

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
